channel.title: OrionScape Server ~HD, Economy, PKing Heaven, Hamachi~
channel.description:
Well, I was developing a 508 LD server, when I was thinking about an HD server. I started to think it would be impossible to do, considering I only had .class files. When I recieved a copy of Hotyute from Rune-Server's Open-Source Client for HD, I went nuts. Now, I have fully working HD for Vista.
I AM E KILLSWITCH FROM RUNE-SERVER & RUNELOCUS!
OrionScape Has: Economy Special Surprise for PKers when operating a White 2H Working Bank Working Interfaces Working Shops Working Rune Claws ----------------------- Moderator gets: Small piece of realty determined by me Banning rights All of the above ---------------------- Admin gets: God Master Large piece of realty Control of an army (clan) Access to their "warzone" admin ---------------------- Respected Membs get: Small realty determined by me Leadership position in an Army instantly Access to their "warzone" council
I'll have to PM a Mod to set up a Development team
Pics: (Updates Soon)
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2j0o6ec.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/ano2g.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/23rn8m8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2u91ksg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2r3hv7p.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1p78fs.jpg[/img]
Some of these pics are from my Win7 progress. Others are the Vista pics

@OrionScape wrote:

Well, I was developing a 508 LD server, when I was thinking about an HD server. I started to think it would be impossible to do, considering I only had .class files. When I recieved a copy of Hotyute from Rune-Server’s Open-Source Client for HD, I went nuts. Now, I have fully working HD for Vista.

I AM E KILLSWITCH FROM RUNE-SERVER & RUNELOCUS!

OrionScape Has:
Economy
Special Surprise for PKers when operating a White 2H
Working Bank
Working Interfaces
Working Shops
Working Rune Claws

Moderator gets:
Small piece of realty determined by me
Banning rights
All of the above

God
Master
Large piece of realty
Control of an army (clan)
Access to their “warzone” admin

Respected Membs get:
Small realty determined by me
Leadership position in an Army instantly

I’ll have to PM a Mod to set up a Development team
